(UNITURN mérőállomás doboz fedlap 3)
(cmd line: -i uniturn_doboz_fedlap_3.txt -t)
(plot cmd: -i uniturn_doboz_fedlap_3.txt -t -p)
(szerszám beállítás)

t2 m d2 h19

safe0,0,3

yxz

(1.menet)

t2
s50
f300

ox = 0.05
#68.05

my = 26.3
mx = 35.7
mx = add($mx,$ox)
ma = 12.05

print "mx: $mx"
print "my: $my"
print "ma: $ma"

hx = 63
hx = add($hx,$ox)
hy = 30

c2 = 0.2
c3 = 0.1
z2 = 4
mz = -2
dj1 = 0.1

print "c2=$c2"
print "z2=$z2"

hx1 = 45
hx1 = add($hx1,$ox)

h $hx1,18,$mz z$z2 c$c3  d3 jg$dj1

b inline $mx,$my,$mz size12.5,5.1 z$z2 c$c2 ng
h $hx,$hy d3 z$z2 c$c3 jg$dj1

my = add($my,$ma)
hy = add($hy,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my,$mz  z$z2 c$c2 size12.5,5.1 ng
h $hx,$hy z$z2 c$c3 d3 jg$dj1

my = add($my,$ma)
hy = add($hy,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my,$mz z$z2 c$c2 size12.5,5.1 ng
h $hx,$hy z$z2 c$c3 d3 jg$dj1

my = add($my,$ma)
hy = add($hy,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my,$mz z$z2 c$c2 size12.5,5.1 ng
h $hx,$hy z$z2 c$c3 d3 jg$dj1

my = add($my,$ma)
hy = add($hy,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my,$mz z$z2 c$c2 size12.5,5.1 ng
h $hx,$hy z$z2 c$c3 d3 jg$dj1

my = add($my,$ma)
hy = add($hy,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my,$mz z$z2 c$c2 size12.5,5.1 ng
h $hx,$hy z$z2 c$c3 d3 jg$dj1

my = add($my,$ma)
hy = add($hy,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my,$mz z$z2 c$c2 size12.5,5.1 ng
h $hx,$hy z$z2 c$c3 d3 jg$dj1

my = add($my,$ma)
hy = add($hy,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my,$mz z$z2 c$c2 size12.5,5.1 ng
h $hx,$hy z$z2 c$c3 d3 jg$dj1

my = add($my,$ma)
hy = add($hy,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my,$mz z$z2 c$c2 size12.5,5.1 ng
h $hx,$hy z$z2 c$c3 d3 jg$dj1

my = add($my,$ma)
hy = add($hy,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my,$mz z$z2 c$c2 size12.5,5.1 ng
h $hx,$hy z$z2 c$c3 d3 jg$dj1




(2. menet)

t2

f600

my = 26.3
mx = 35.7
mx = add($mx,$ox)

print "mx: $mx"
print "my: $my"
print "ma: $ma"

c2 = 0.1
z2 = 4
j1 = 0.4

print "c2=$c2"
print "z2=$z2"

b inline $mx,$my,$mz size12.5,5.1 z$z2 c$c2  ng jg$j1

my = add($my,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my,$mz size12.5,5.1 jg$j1 ng

my = add($my,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my,$mz size12.5,5.1 jg$j1 ng

my = add($my,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my,$mz size12.5,5.1 jg$j1 ng

my = add($my,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my,$mz size12.5,5.1 jg$j1 ng

my = add($my,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my,$mz size12.5,5.1 jg$j1 ng

my = add($my,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my,$mz size12.5,5.1 jg$j1 ng

my = add($my,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my,$mz size12.5,5.1 jg$j1 ng

my = add($my,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my,$mz size12.5,5.1 jg$j1 ng

my = add($my,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my,$mz size12.5,5.1 jg$j1 ng

#b outline 0,0 size220,166 z0.1 c0.1 ng
